resources.string: Immersed Statusbar for Miui6\nAuthor: kqstone (kqstone@163.com)\nAcknowledgment: Great thanks to MohammadAG (https://github.com/MohammadAG/Xposed-Tinted-Status-Bar) for lots of sources.
Begin to download profiles from interent, please wait!
Begin to download profiles at background, please wait for a moment!
Normal user isn\'t suggested to use debug mode, as it may cause some problems. \nClose the debug mode?
Force tint statusbar for app without single or gradual uppart
Flat and tint Notification Icons to adapt statusbar background.
Fast the statusbar content animation when darkmode change
Export package and activity information for profile generation
Export activity informmation and cache drawable to sdcard
Great thanks to MohammadAG for lots of sources. \n(https://github.com/MohammadAG/Xposed-Tinted-Status-Bar)
Profile is xml files that makes ISB more suitable for certain apps, you can download from ISB settings interface. \nMost profiles are made by watcgfw. \nhttps://github.com/watcgfw/ISBpreferences
